dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Dark one, you stand before Nergal, guardian of light and justice. Speak your intentions or face the wrath of holiness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your light will be snuffed out, just as day succumbs to night.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one who dwells in the shadows. What power can darkness wield against purity?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: More than you can comprehend, holy one. The darkest shadows hide ancient secrets.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Shadows and secrets are weak against the blinding light of truth. Prepare for your defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have defeated many who thought the same. You will be no different.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your hubris will be your downfall. The light shall prevail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps, but I am not so easily vanquished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the holy wrath and perish in the light.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Darkness is the rightful state of this world. All shall return to it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such blasphemies will not go unchallenged. You will repent or be destroyed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will never repent. My conviction is stronger than your light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, we shall test your conviction with the blade of righteousness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let the world decide who is right.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The world has already decided. It seeks the light, not your darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You assume much, holy one. Perhaps there is more to darkness than you think.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I have studied the darkness, I know its corruptions. It has no place here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you are a fool, for you have learned nothing of true power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insulting a being of light will yield you no results but your own demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us see which knowledge prevails.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge means little against the righteous fury of the light.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek the power hidden within these lands. Stand aside or be obliterated.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power is dangerous and corrupting. Why pursue such folly?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Because only power can reshape the world as it should be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak as one blinded by ambitions. The light will not let you prevail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Ambition births greatness. Your light has blinded you to this truth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are mistaken. True greatness lies in humility and service.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fool! I will show you the might that ambition brings.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your misguided beliefs will bring your swift downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Only power can cleanse this fractured world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The world does not seek cleansing through darkness. Your path leads only to ruin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then prepare to be part of that ruin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I shall defend the light till my last breath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate the cleansing power of shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your shadows will find no foothold here. Leave or face destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Power is the only truth. The weak must submit to the strong.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength without purpose is dangerous. Submit to the light and find peace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Never! Peace is a lie the weak tell themselves.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will find no peace, only the obliteration you seek.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall show you how dangerous your underestimation is.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then prove your worth in battle, though it will be your last.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps we can find common ground. The world is dying, after all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is wisdom in seeking peace. What do you propose?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A truce, until we understand these lands better.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Let us hope we can reach a greater understanding.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Yes, together, we might restore balance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: For now, we shall walk this path in mutual respect. May the light guide us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Indeed, let us cease hostilities.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Agreed. Perhaps it is not too late for redemption and peace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We share a common enemy in ignorance and chaos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed, knowledge and order are valued above all. What is your suggestion?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Exchange knowledge, to fortify our strengths against chaos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A noble endeavor. Let us share what we know and prepare for the trials ahead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Form a temporary alliance to defeat our mutual enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. For now, our goals align, and we shall unite against the dark forces.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The light and dark need not be enemies. What say you?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A curious thought, but potentially fruitful. What is it you propose?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: An alliance, to protect the realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: For now, I accept your proposal. May the light and shadows coexist in harmony.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A ceasefire, to better understand each other's strengths.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Agreed. Understanding brings wisdom, and wisdom brings peace.
